aiHints.identificationPrompt: Identify this shot glass. Extract: location/city, theme, design elements, manufacturer marks, era.
aiHints.gradingRules: Assess: chips, cracks, print condition, color fading, base condition. Grade: Mint/Excellent/Good/Fair/Poor.
aiHints.valuationRules: Consider: rarity, location significance, vintage status, condition, collectibility, set completeness.
